articles.title: 5 planets will align on March 27 and you won't want to miss it. Here's where to look. - Space.com
articles.description: The moon and star cluster M35 will also be getting in on the action.
articles.content:
On Mar. 27, a planetary parade made up of Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Mars and Uranus will march across the sky.
At this particular time of the year, amateur astronomers are participating in the Messie… [+7890 chars]
